title: Phil Spector's Wall of Sound
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Phil Spector's Wall of Sound.

hook.text: Phil Spector stacked so many instruments in the studio that the sound hit you like a wave.

buildup.text: His Wall of Sound technique used multiple guitars, pianos, and drums playing the same parts.

discovery.text: Be My Baby by the Ronettes became the blueprint for pop production for decades.

climax.text: His production innovations influenced the Beatles, Bruce Springsteen, and the Beach Boys.

punchline.text: He built a wall of sound. His legacy is behind a wall of controversy.
